activities: Company provides digital publishing software services to its customers. Most of Company’s revenue comes from its customers that are businesses.  Company may receive and process data from its business customers in order to provide its Services, and this data may contain personal data.  Company’s Safe Harbor certification covers the Personal Data that Company receives from the EU and Switzerland on behalf of business customers in order to provide its services.  Such data may include the first and last names of individual end users and email addresses, as well as company affiliation, contact information and other information end users submit. Company is a data processor for Support Data and will only process such data on behalf of and under the instructions of its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data contained data that Company receives and processes on behalf of its business customers.
